channel.title: My little knife (now with tut vid)
channel.description:
Just a little trick i do with my knife. Cut myself a while back, and this was a new knife i was testing it with. In the vid the lock actually closed once while doing it, lol. Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v8510GxWjvM
P.S - I do it slow once in middle of the vid so you can see exactly what im doing. Also, this was recorded with my cell, so plz dont complain about quality. :(
Vid showing what im doing: (no its not me, but its the over-hand that im doing) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ncPiK_k7df0

item.title: My little knife (now with tut vid)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I never said it was hard. If your not careful doing it though you can cause some real harm to someone. Plus, i can get the knife both open and closed like that in 1.5 seconds. Not sure if i got it that fast in the vid, but i timed myself about a week ago.

EDIT - Also, mind if i PM you about a question with how the Karma works? I have a site that im trying to change the karma to work somewhat like this when adding reputation.

Read full topic

Need a camera with higher FPS if you want to record something like this. Also, it really isn’t that hard, all you need is a butterfly knife.
